meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of a hero
meanings.sent1: The heroical deeds of the brave knight inspired the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The heroical tale of the firefighter rescuing the cat from the tree spread quickly.
meanings.sent3: The heroical squirrel bravely faced the challenge of crossing the busy road.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to finish the marathon was truly heroical.
meanings.sent5: The heroical rescue mission in the stormy sea will be remembered for years to come.

meanings.sent1: The heroical costume made him feel invincible at the costume party.
meanings.sent2: Her heroical actions during the crisis earned her the admiration of her peers.
meanings.sent3: The heroical cape fluttered behind him as he ran to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The heroical music in the background added to the intensity of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The heroical statue in the town square honored the fallen soldiers.

meanings.sent1: The heroical soldier fearlessly charged into battle to protect his comrades.
meanings.sent2: She showed heroical courage when she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The heroical puppy barked loudly at the approaching stranger.
meanings.sent4: The heroical firefighter rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.
meanings.sent5: His heroical determination to climb the mountain despite the storm was admirable.
